original_title: Y aura-t-il des rencontres à Rastoul?
overview: Wandering through the mechanisms of peasantry in the Cantal region, this film attempts to create a free space where the filmmaker and the peasant women engage in some kind of collaboration; the daily work of cheesemaking, the temporary labour of filmmaking and the love for both tend to form a poetic triangular relationship.
title: Y aura-t-il des rencontres à Rastoul?
